execution_plan.description: Find customer IDs who have at least 2 payment methods.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id FROM customer_payment_methods GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;

execution_plan.description: Get orders (order_id, customer_id, date_order_placed) for customers identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_id, customer_id, date_order_placed FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
